definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: We want to buy Seafood, Sheepskins, Rapeseed, Edible Oils, Wheats , Gold Bullion.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购海鲜，羊皮，油菜籽，食品油，小麦。

sentences.english: In addition, the property and refining method of cold pressing rapeseed oil were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的是未脱皮油菜籽直接冷榨工艺。

sentences.english: A reliable method to separate and identify glucosinolates in rapeseed has been reported.
sentences.chinese: 报道了一个分离鉴定油菜籽中硫苷组分的有效方法。

sentences.english: The seed of the rape plant.
sentences.chinese: 那部机器从油菜籽榨出油。

sentences.english: Ren Jinxiang is waiting until September to seed rape on her field.
sentences.chinese: 任金祥等待着九月份在田地上播种油菜籽苗。

sentences.english: The oil extracted from rapeseeds is yellowish-brown.
sentences.chinese: 用油菜籽榨出的油颜色是土黄色的。

sentences.english: There aren't many rape seeds left.
The paper probes into the processing conditions for the decortication of rapeseed.
sentences.chinese: 在实验室基础上，对油菜籽脱壳工艺条件进行了研究。

sentences.english: The genetic improvement is an effective way to reduce glucosinolate content of the rapeseed.
sentences.chinese: 遗传改良是降低油菜籽中硫甙含量的有效途径。

sentences.english: Total is not equal to the sum of regional figures in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年油菜籽产量全省数与分市相加不等。

definition: oil crop (rape, peanut, soy, sesame etc)/oil-bearing crop
